1.0.name: wordpress/schmap-sports-widget
1.0.description: This plugin enables a Schmap widget to be added to either the sidebar, or the main body, of your Wordpress blog. Schmap widgets provide an extremely simple and flexible way of presenting data relevant to your blog on a map. Some available Schmap widgets include: - Schmap travel guide widgets (eg. Sights & attraction on a city map) - Schmap sports widgets (eg. a teams season highlighted as stadium venues on a country map) - Schmap concert tour widgets (eg. a bands tour schedule highlighted as venues on a country map) For a complete list of available widgets visit http://www.schmap.com/widgets
